suites.title: Search functionality.
suites.description: The testing search functionality of the site.
suites.preconditions: We have to load the site teodor.bg successfully and click the search button.

suites.title: Search different product.
suites.description: Load some product on the search menu successfully.
suites.preconditions: 1. The home page loads successfully. 2. Click the button search on the home page.

cases.title: Search "лен"
cases.description: Testing of search functionality of product “лен“.
cases.postconditions: Users can see a menu whit different types of products of “лен” in the first section.

steps.expected_result: Users can see the drop-down menu with many of the most searched products “НАЙ-ТЪРСЕНИ”.
You can see a  menu with different types of products of “лен” in the first section.

cases.title: Search "дънки".
cases.description: Testing of search functionality of product “дънки“.
cases.preconditions: 1. Home page load successfully. 2. The ico - search is an active button.
cases.postconditions: Users can see a menu with different types of products of “дънки” in the first section.

steps.expected_result: Users can see the drop-down menu with many of the most searched products “НАЙ-ТЪРСЕНИ”.
Users can see a menu with different types of products of “дънки” in the first section.

cases.title: Search functionality is an active button.
cases.description: Search functionality is an activ button. Looks like a small magnifying glass on the right side of the dashboard.
cases.preconditions: 1. Home page load successfully. 2. The icon search is the first button on the right side of the header.

steps.expected_result: Users can see that the button is active.
